features: Tailored Precision for Sensitive Skin: Anthony Shave Gel is expertly crafted to cater specifically to the needs of sensitive skin. The formulation goes beyond the ordinary, offering a non-detergent, non-foaming solution that ensures a smooth and irritation-free shaving experience. The transparent gel allows for precision grooming, allowing you to see every detail during your shave without the worry of irritation caused by common foaming agents.

Unisex Elegance in Grooming: Embrace a grooming solution that transcends gender boundaries. Our shaving gel has gained widespread popularity not only among men but also among women seeking a gentle yet effective shaving experience. Perfect for delicate areas like the bikini line, Anthony Shave Gel is a versatile solution that caters to the diverse grooming needs of individuals with sensitive skin.

Gentle Acne Defense: Break away from the misconception that acne control has to be abrasive. Anthony Shave Gel incorporates the calming properties of eucalyptus and rosemary, presenting a refreshing and gentle approach to acne prevention. Revel in a dual benefit as you achieve a close shave while maintaining blemish-free skin, making every grooming session a step towards healthier skin.

Revolutionary Aloe Vera Infusion: Elevate your shaving routine with the groundbreaking technology of Aloe Vera Beads. Upon contact with the razor, these beads burst, releasing a burst of hydration. The aloe not only cools and heals the skin but also enhances the glide for a closer, smoother shave. This feature is particularly beneficial for those aiming to maintain a smooth, bald head, providing a spa-like experience with every shave.

Ethical and Safe Grooming: Prioritize your skin's health with Anthony Shave Gel, free from harmful irritants such as parabens, phthalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan. Rigorously allergy and dermatologist tested, this cruelty-free product is not only safe for your skin but also aligns with ethical values. Whether it's part of your daily grooming routine, your travel essentials, or conveniently stored in your gym locker, Anthony Shave Gel represents a commitment to the well-being of your skin.

reviews.reviewText: Love this stuff and will continue to use as long as they make it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: Skin Type: Very SensitiveShave Area: Head + FaceShaver: Braun Series 9This shaving gel is excellent! If you have sensitive skin, I would suggest this to be your go-to shaving gel! It doesn't clog my Braun Series 9 shaver or cause ANY razor burn or discomfort. I usually spread an even quarter size layer over my head and face, then wait about 60/seconds for it to do its magic!If you have sensitive skin, I suggest shaving gel over cream!I have tried:Neutrogena Shave Defense Cream - Caused me extreme razor burn, didn't clog Braun Series 9Bevel Shaving Cream - Caused me razor burn, clogged Braun Series 9Jack Black Beard Lube Cream - Caused me to breakout, didn't cause razor burn, didn't clog Braun Series 9PC4MEN Shave Cream - Clogged Braun Series 9, didn't cause razor burnZIRH Shaving Gel - As of 12/11/20 contains Parabens, so I didn't try and returned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving gel
reviews.reviewText: After using Anthony's pre-shave oil, the gel is terrific..you probably could use an AXE, and you wouldn't cut yourself..another good thing is you only need a little and lather it all over your face...of course, the BEST way to shave is IN THE SHOWER, NOT over the sink...a shave expert in London told me that was " barbaric & caveman style". He told me to buy a small mirror for the shower, let the warm water splash on my face for 30 seconds to get it moist & soft, then apply the pre-shave oil & Anthony's Gel. The difference in the shaving experience this way is the differnce between a Ritz- Carlton and a Motel 6. I used to use EDGE, or something similar, that was cheap & easy to find. Now I haven't used that low-end stuff in 15 years. And like I said in my pre-shave review, I've cut myself MAYBE 5 times in 15 years. Other great brands are ELEMIS ( THE BEST, but most $$$), Geoff Trumper's, Key West Aloe Frictionless Shave Cream, and The Art Of Shaving products. You'll LOVE the way your face feels afterwards..Ladies, this would make a great present for any man..don't forget another great reason to shave in the shower is that you don't make a mess with your beard hairs all over the sink- they go directly into the shower drain. I bring my shaving mirror everywhere ( I have 2-one for my home shower, one portable)..try this, you'll actually NOT mind shaving ( imagine that!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gel vs cream
reviews.reviewText: Twice now I have ordered Anthony shave GEL and have been sent Anthony shave CREAM. The pack of three is labeled GEL, but inside the pack is a different product.That said the cream works well, just hard to rinse off after a shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for shaving sensitive skin. Period.
reviews.reviewText: Over the years I've tried just about every shaving cream and gel available. The cheap supermarket stuff does nothing but leave me with a face full of bloody nicks. Creams often give me razor burn, plus you simply can't *see* what you're shaving underneath the layer of whiteness.Finally I found Anthony Shave Gel, and I've been a faithful user for at least six or seven years now. I've used it on a day's stubble and a week's stubble, with little difference in result. I've used it with a variety of razors, from MACH 3s to Fusions to the current ones I get from the Dollar Shave Club. The results are almost always uniform. I don't even have problems shaving against the grain, to get that super-close cut, and I NEVER get razor burn.I've noticed Anthony has subtly changed the product over the years; now it has new packaging (the white bottle pictured here is now dark gray and black) and a bit more of the moisturizing beads inside. I haven't noticed much difference on my face, though. It's all worked great. I'll continue using this product as long as they keep making it! (and I hope that's a while - I've seen too many of my favorite men's products disappear from the market, plus a number of my local stores no longer carry the Anthony Logistics line at all)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast delivery, effective product, third reorder!
reviews.reviewText: Been shaving for 45+ years, tried this product two years ago, skin has never felt better during and after shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I don’t plan to buy this product again.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had previously purchased this item and it worked fine; however, that was not the case this time. After using it four times, it caused a severe rash and burning sensation on my face, with the redness lasting a few hours. It was embarrassing to go to work looking like that. I decided to give it another chance, but the same reaction occurred again, and then a third time. My wife suggested returning it, but we thought perhaps the specific bottle was defective. We ended up trying four different bottles, using each one time, and each caused the same reaction. I’m aware that my return window has closed, but I would like a refund as it seems every new bottle I try results in the same rash and burns on my face. I honestly don’t think I will purchase this product again.

Anthony ist ein Produkt für Männer, die eine Reaktion auf der Haut mögen, insbesondere ein Frischegefühl/-erlebnis haben wollen deren Haut aber sehr empfindlich ist. Anthony arbeitet mit Menthol und Aloevera. Die Ätherischen Öle haben eine Kühleffekt, der einfach erfrischend und super angenehm ist. Der Verzicht auf Alkohol und die Zugabe von Aloevera machen das Geld extrem verträglich. Ich bin damit die üblichen Hautirritationen nach der Rasur losgeworden. Sehr zu empfehlen! Achtung beim Kauf darauf achten, dass die Ware aus der BRD verschickt wird.

reviews.reviewText: This is a new product for me as far as it goes its good quite refreshing and although you need a good layer it give a nice shave and has the added bonus of not foaming so you can see the facial hair you wish to keep
